code: /**  * Fetch the wrapped client. Use this to make calls that don't set {@link ActionRequest#setParentTask(TaskId)}.  */ public Client unwrap() {     return in(). }

@Override protected <Request extends ActionRequest, Response extends ActionResponse> void doExecute(Action<Response> action, Request request, ActionListener<Response> listener) {     request.setParentTask(parentTask).     super.doExecute(action, request, listener). }
